title: Hamidreza Taraghi
text:
Hamidreza Taraghi () is an Iranian "<a href="bazaari">bazaari</a>" merchant and <a href="Iranian%20Principlists">conservative</a> politician who served a member of the <a href="Parliament%20of%20Iran">Parliament of Iran</a> from 1996 to 2000 <a href="Mashhad%20and%20Kalat%20%28electoral%20district%29">Mashhad and Kalat electoral district</a>.
Taraghi formerly headed <a href="Islamic%20Coalition%20Party">Islamic Coalition Party</a>'s bureau for international affairs.
